2.3.2.name: wordpress/actionaffiliate
2.3.2.description: Action Affiliate searches Amazon, ebay, and cj for products that coincide with your post. Action Affiliate allows you to turn on and off advertisers (i.e. You only want to list Amazon ads on your site.) Be sure to configure this plugin in your Wordpress settings. To use add in post, simply place shortcode in post where you want ad to appear (i.e. [aa keywords=""] ).
